newsitem.title: UK: Cazenove Indian GDR Index up 1.64 percent.
newsitem.headline: Cazenove Indian GDR Index up 1.64 percent.

text.p: The Cazenove Indian GDR Index rose 1.19 points, 1.54 percent, to 73.84 points on Tuesday after the Bombay Stock Exchange 30 share index rose 98.75 points, 3.15 percent, to 3,228.96.
The premium for GDRs over stocks on the local market was 13.65 percent.
The Cazenove index is a capitalisation weighted basket of Indian global depositary receipts and measures the change from midday on the previous trading day to midday today.
